se.sics.util
Class X509KeySelector

java.lang.Object
  javax.xml.crypto.KeySelector
      se.sics.util.X509KeySelector

public class X509KeySelector
extends javax.xml.crypto.KeySelector

Implementation of KeySelector. Returns the public key from the first X.509 certificate it finds in the X509Data.

Author:
Sean Mullan
